name: Jack McLantern
description:
Jack is a guy that met Satan and tricked him into promising to never take his soul

He wasn't good enough for paradise though, so when he died he ended up in purgatory

Death has now brought him back to life to deal with Satan's Halloween Shenanigans, in exchange for a solution to his Eternal Torment

Check out the Alpha, leave feedback and follow the development of Jack McLantern here on itch.io
